citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
04/28/2016.
The inspector spoke with an individual who indicated a representative was not at the facility and could not return
within a half-hour.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm  on
04/28/2016.
The inspector spoke with an individual who indicated a representative was not at the facility and could not return
within a half-hour.
